title: Strange UI behavior for wallpaper selection
content:
Say I want to change my lock screen wallpaper. I open settings, choose styles & wallpers, swipe right to chose the lock screen preview. I then click one of the options, then, for some inexplicable reason, lock screen preview disappears and is replaced with the home screen.  I must select "Lock screen" at the top.  This will be the second time selecting this option for one task. OK, so I like it. I click the check mark, now it's giving me the option to set it as my home screen, lock screen, or both.  So, again I'm being given more options than I want as a user.  I just want to change my lock screen.  

The last choice is nothing new, but the behavior before that is a bit goofy. I was legitimately confused when I selected a wallpaper for my lock screen when the home screen preview popped up. Not intuitive.

Google, maybe sort this out in your next update?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
